attributes.action: Allow access to the results of Energy Performance Certs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allowing access to the results of Energy Performance Certificates would permit research to be undertaken that will identify type, age and location of the building stock that should be prioritised for energy efficiency improvements.  At the moment CLG won't allow access to the data.  Given the urgency of climate change, is this the right attitude?
